Projects I’ve been involved in

  • Walk-all-ova - Senior Design: an indoor positioning system
  • Flyin - A web app for flight plan creation
  • SMAC Project Page - A GitHub project page built with Bootstrap and powered by Jekyll
  • SMAC-IRP - The SMAC Integrated Rapid Prototyping Toolkit - A Chrome Web App for building small robots

Projects I participated in

  • SMAC-IAR - Firmware libraries and examples to build with IAR EW8051 toolchain
  • SMAC-SDCC - Firmware libraries and examples to build with the open source SDCC
  • Baxter the Master Chef - A program that directs a robot called “Baxter” to cut ham
